title: Ciphered Resistance
outcome: Overnight, a popular puzzle app pushes new daily challenges that, when solved, map to hidden locations. Following the clues, citizens discover caches containing lists with names and dates linked to 'invisible' citizens. The information sparks coordinated resistance and new networks. While Innovators investigate whether Halden encoded the clues, Directorate issues threats and increases BCI enforcement. Meanwhile, mass protests spread as more citizens realize the extent of manipulation and erasure within the system.

events.description: A puzzle app update releases cryptic challenges. Within hours, players decode solutions pointing to obscure city locations.
Groups of residents use the clues to uncover hidden caches containing lists of vanished 'invisible' citizens, sparking widespread alarm and curiosity.
Citizen networks rapidly form, distributing the caches' information and coordinating safe zones for those targeted by BCI manipulation.
Directorate issues stern warnings and increases BCI enforcement to prevent further discoveries, leading to heightened tensions in affected neighborhoods.
Large protests break out as more people realize the scale of erasure and systemic manipulation. Innovators call for a formal investigation into Halden's encoded legacy.
